english.segment1: Here I am again. In this raging sea. On my knees again. Deep calls to deep. I feel I'm drowning. My arms are. Just too tired to swim. I feel I'm sinking. On my knees again. In the roar of Your waterfall. In the storm of You. May You find me holding on. May You find me true

english.segment3: Bridge: Wash me clean. Set me free. Hold me close. And cover me
